an9.35:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gavi pabbateyya bala abyatta akhettannu akusala visame pabbate caritum.
an9.35:1.3: ‘yannunaham agatapubbanceva disam gaccheyyam, akhaditapubbani ca tinani khadeyyam, apitapubbani ca paniyani piveyyan’ti.
an9.35:1.4: Sa purimam padam na suppatitthitam patitthapetva pacchimam padam uddhareyya.
an9.35:1.5: Sa na ceva agatapubbam disam gaccheyya, na ca akhaditapubbani tinani khadeyya, na ca apitapubbani paniyani piveyya;
an9.35:1.7: ‘yannunaham agatapubbanceva disam gaccheyyam, akhaditapubbani ca tinani khadeyyam, apitapubbani ca paniyani piveyyan’ti tanca padesam na sotthina paccagaccheyya.
an9.35:1.9: Tatha hi sa, bhikkhave, gavi pabbateyya bala abyatta akhettannu akusala visame pabbate caritum.
an9.35:1.10: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu balo abyatto akhettannu akusalo vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an9.35:1.11: so tam nimittam na asevati na bhaveti na bahulikaroti na svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:2.2: ‘yannunaham vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:2.3: So na sakkoti vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an9.35:2.5: ‘yannunaham vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:2.6: So na sakkoti vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an9.35:2.7: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu ubhato bhattho ubhato parihino, seyyathapi sa gavi pabbateyya bala abyatta akhettannu akusala visame pabbate caritum’.
an9.35:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gavi pabbateyya pandita byatta khettannu kusala visame pabbate caritum.
an9.35:3.3: ‘yannunaham agatapubbanceva disam gaccheyyam, akhaditapubbani ca tinani khadeyyam, apitapubbani ca paniyani piveyyan’ti.
an9.35:3.4: Sa purimam padam suppatitthitam patitthapetva pacchimam padam uddhareyya.
an9.35:3.5: Sa agatapubbanceva disam gaccheyya, akhaditapubbani ca tinani khadeyya, apitapubbani ca paniyani piveyya.
an9.35:3.7: ‘yannunaham agatapubbanceva disam gaccheyyam, akhaditapubbani ca tinani khadeyyam, apitapubbani ca paniyani piveyyan’ti tanca padesam sotthina paccagaccheyya.
an9.35:3.9: Tatha hi sa, bhikkhave, gavi pabbateyya pandita byatta khettannu kusala visame pabbate caritum.
an9.35:3.10: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pandito byatto khettannu kusalo vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:3.11: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:4.2: ‘yannunaham vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:4.3: So dutiyam jhanam anabhihimsamano vitakkavicaranam vupasama … dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:4.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:5.2: ‘yannunaham pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca vihareyyam sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeyyam yam tam ariya acikkhanti—upekkhako satima sukhavihariti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:5.3: So tatiyam jhanam anabhihimsamano pitiya ca viraga … tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:5.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:6.2: ‘yannunaham sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:6.3: So catuttham jhanam anabhihimsamano sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:6.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:7.2: ‘yannunaham sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ananto akasoti akasanancayatanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:7.3: So akasanancayatanam anabhihimsamano sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama …pe… akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:7.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:8.2: ‘yannunaham sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:8.3: So vinnanancayatanam anabhihimsamano sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:8.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:9.2: ‘yannunaham sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:9.3: So akincannayatanam anabhihimsamano sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:9.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:10.2: ‘yannunaham sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:10.3: So nevasannanasannayatanam anabhihimsamano sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:10.4: So tam nimittam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti svadhitthitam adhitthati.
an9.35:11.2: ‘yannunaham sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an9.35:11.3: So sannavedayitanirodham anabhihimsamano sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
an9.35:12.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tam tadeva samapattim samapajjatipi vutthatipi, tassa mudu cittam hoti kammannam.
an9.35:12.2: Muduna kammannena cittena appamano samadhi hoti subhavito.
an9.35:12.3: So appamanena samadhina subhavitena yassa yassa abhinnasacchikaraniyassa dhammassa cittam abhininnameti abhinnasacchikiriyaya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an9.35:13.1: So sace akankhati: ‘anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhaveyyam—ekopi hutva bahudha assam, bahudhapi hutva eko assam …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteyyan’ti,
an9.35:13.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an9.35:15.1: So sace akankhati: ‘parasattanam parapuggalanam cetasa ceto paricca pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.2: saragam va cittam saragam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.3: vitaragam va cittam vitaragam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.4: sadosam va cittam sadosam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.5: vitadosam va cittam vitadosam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.6: samoham va cittam samoham cittanti pajaneyyam,
an9.35:15.17: avimuttam va cittam avimuttam cittanti pajaneyyan’ti,
an9.35:15.18: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an9.35:16.1: So sace akankhati: ‘anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyam, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo …pe… iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyan’ti,
an9.35:16.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an9.35:17.1: So sace akankhati: ‘dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena …pe… yathakammupage satte pajaneyyan’ti
an9.35:17.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an9.35:18.1: So sace akankhati: ‘asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an9.35:18.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane”ti.
